Installation and Running¶

You need to define following Environment Variables:
  • DATABASE_URL = ‘<yourdburi>’
  • FLASK_APP = wsgi.py
  • FLASK_DEBUG = ‘True/False’

Clone the repository: https://github.com/sohaibfarooqi/stargate.git

Create VirtualEnv: virtualenv -p “path to python” env source env/bin/activate

Running: flask run
